<!-- matrix-2 -->

What kind of mathematical object will the following produce?

$$\left(\begin{array}{r} 
 2 & 2 & 5 & -9 \\ 
\end{array}\right) \times 
\left(\begin{array}{r} 
-1 \\ 
0 \\ 
-5 \\ 
4 \\ 
\end{array}\right)$$

```{mcq}
#| label: mcq-matrix-2
#| inline: true
1. A scalar [correct]
2. A column vector
3. A row vector
4. A matrix with three columns
5. A matrix with three rows
6. It's meaningless. 
```
